original_text: But what I tell you is this. If somebody does something bad to you, do not do anything against him. Somebody may slap you on one side of your face. Then you should also let him slap the other side of your face.
korean_text: 나는 너희에게 이르노니 악한 자를 대적하지 말라 누구든지 네 오른편 뺨을 치거든 왼편도 돌려 대며

sentences.original_text: But what I tell you is this.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 너희에게 말하는 것은 이것이다.

sentences.original_text: If somebody does something bad to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 너에게 나쁜 일을 하면,

sentences.original_text: do not do anything against him.
on one side of your face.
Then you should also let him
slap the other side of your face.
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 뺨 다른 쪽을 때리도록 내버려 두어야 한다.
